title: 新约 - 哥林多前书(1 Corinthians) - 第 3 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 哥林多前书(1 Corinthians) -- 第 3 章 ( 本篇共有 16 章 )

lineList.en: And I, brethren, could not speak unto you as unto spiritual, but as unto carnal, even as unto babes in Christ.
lineList.cn: 弟兄们，我从前对你们说话，不能把你们当作属灵的，只得把你们当作属肉体，在基督里为婴孩的。

lineList.en: I have fed you with milk, and not with meat: for hitherto ye were not able to bear it, neither yet now are ye able.
lineList.cn: 我是用奶喂你们，没有用饭喂你们。那时你们不能吃，就是如今还是不能。

lineList.en: For ye are yet carnal: for whereas there is among you envying, and strife, and divisions, are ye not carnal, and walk as men?
lineList.cn: 你们仍是属肉体的。因为在你们中间有嫉妒分争，这岂不是属乎肉体，照着世人的样子行吗。

lineList.en: For while one saith, I am of Paul; and another, I am of Apollos; are ye not carnal?
lineList.cn: 有说，我是属保罗的。有说，我是属亚波罗的。这岂不是你们和世人一样吗。

lineList.en: Who then is Paul, and who is Apollos, but ministers by whom ye believed, even as the Lord gave to every man?
lineList.cn: 亚波罗算什么。保罗算什么。无非是执事，照主所赐给他们各人的，引导你们相信。

lineList.en: I have planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.
lineList.cn: 我栽种了，亚波罗浇灌了。惟有神叫他生长。

lineList.en: So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.
lineList.cn: 可见栽种的算不得什么，浇灌的也算不得什么。只在那叫他生长的神。

lineList.en: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.
lineList.cn: 栽种的和浇灌的都是一样。但将来各人要照自己的工夫，得自己的赏赐。

lineList.en: For we are labourers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.
lineList.cn: 因为我们是与神同工的。你们是神所耕种的田地，所建造的房屋。

lineList.en: According to the grace of God which is given unto me, as a wise masterbuilder, I have laid the foundation, and another buildeth thereon. But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon.
lineList.cn: 我照神所给我的恩，好像一个聪明的工头，立好了根基，有别人在上面建造。只是各人要谨慎怎样在上面建造。

lineList.en: For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ.
lineList.cn: 因为那已经立好的根基，就是耶稣基督，此外没有人能立别的根基。

lineList.en: Now if any man build upon this foundation gold, silver, precious stones, wood, hay, stubble;
lineList.cn: 若有人用金，银，宝石，草木，禾楷，在这根基上建造。

lineList.en: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.
lineList.cn: 各人的工程必然显露。因为那日子要将他表明出来，有火发现。这火要试验各人的工程怎样。

lineList.en: If any man's work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward.
lineList.cn: 人在那根基上所建造的工程，若存得住，他就要得赏赐。

lineList.en: If any man's work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.
lineList.cn: 人的工程若被烧了，他就要受亏损。自己却要得救。虽然得救乃像从火里经过的一样。

lineList.en: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?
lineList.cn: 岂不知你们是神的殿，神的灵住在你们里头吗。

lineList.en: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
lineList.cn: 若有人毁坏神的殿，神必要毁坏那人。因为神的殿是圣的，这殿就是你们。

lineList.en: Let no man deceive himself. If any man among you seemeth to be wise in this world, let him become a fool, that he may be wise.
lineList.cn: 人不可自欺。你们中间若有人，在这世界自以为有智慧，倒不如变作愚拙，好成为有智慧的。

lineList.en: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, He taketh the wise in their own craftiness.
lineList.cn: 因这世界的智慧，在神看是愚拙。如经上记着说，主叫有智慧的中了自己的诡计。

lineList.en: And again, The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise, that they are vain.
lineList.cn: 又说，主知道智慧人的意念是虚妄的。

lineList.en: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;
lineList.cn: 所以无论谁，都不可拿人夸口。因为万有全是你们的。

lineList.en: Whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours;
lineList.cn: 或保罗，或亚波罗，或矶法，或世界，或生，或死，或现今的事，或将来的事，全是你们的。

lineList.en: And ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.
lineList.cn: 并且你们是属基督的。基督又是属神的。
